properties.script:
out0 = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT
  '{Config.sourceSystem}'  AS SRC_SYS_CD,
  EKKO.EBELN AS PO_NUM,
  EKKO.BUKRS AS PRCHSNG_CO_CD,
  EKKO.BSART AS PO_TYPE_CD,
  TRIM(EKKO.BSTYP) AS PO_CAT_TYPE_CD,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.AEDAT = '00000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(EKKO.AEDAT, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS CRT_ON_DTTM,
  TRIM(EKKO.LIFNR) AS SUP_NUM,
  TRIM(EKKO.EKORG) AS PRCHSNG_ORG_NUM,
  T024E.EKOTX AS PRCHSNG_ORG_DESCRIPTION,
  TRIM(EKKO.EKGRP) AS PRCHSNG_GRP_NUM,
  TRIM(EKKO.WAERS) AS CRNCY_CD,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.BEDAT = '00000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(EKKO.BEDAT, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS PO_DTTM,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.KDATB = '00000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(EKKO.KDATB, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS VLD_FROM_DTTM,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.KDATE = '00000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(EKKO.KDATE, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS VLD_TO_DTTM,
  TRIM(EKKO.LLIEF) AS SUPL_VEND_NUM,
  TRIM(EKKO.RESWK) AS SUPL_PLNT_CD,
  TRIM(EKKO.FRGRL) AS RLSE_CMPLT_IND,
  TRIM(EKKO.ZTERM) AS PMT_TERM_CD,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS OWN_EXPLN_OF_TERM_OF_PMT,
  TRIM(EKKO.LPHIS) AS RLSE_DOC_IND,
  TRIM(EKKO.STATU) AS PO_STATUS_CODE,
  TRIM(EKKO.MEMORY) AS PO_NOT_YET_CMPLT,
  TRIM(EKKO.LOEKZ) AS DEL_IND,
  '#' AS ORDR_SFX,
  TRIM(EKKO.UNSEZ) AS OUR_REF,
  TRIM(EKKO.REVNO) AS VERS_NUM_IN_PRCHSNG,
  TRIM(EKKO.ERNAM) AS PRSN_WHO_CRT_A_PRCHSNG_DOC,
  CAST(TRIM(EKKO.WKURS) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS EXCH_RT,
  TRIM(EKKO.BSAKZ) AS CNTL_IN_FOR_PRCHSNG_DOC_TYPE,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.LASTCHANGEDATETIME = '00000000000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(
      substring(EKKO.LASTCHANGEDATETIME, 1, 14),
      'yyyyMMddHHmmss'
    )
  END AS CHG_TIME_STMP_DTTM,
  TRIM(EKKO.PINCR) AS ITM_NUM_INTV,
  TRIM(EKKO.LPONR) AS LAST_ITM_NUM,
  TRIM(EKKO.SPRAS) AS LANG_KEY,
  CAST(TRIM(EKKO.ZBD1T) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS CASH_DISC_DAYS1,
  CAST(TRIM(EKKO.ZBD2T) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS CASH_DISC_DAYS2,
  CAST(TRIM(EKKO.ZBD3T) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS CASH_DISC_DAYS3,
  CAST(TRIM(EKKO.ZBD1P) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS CASH_DISC_PCT_1,
  CAST(TRIM(EKKO.ZBD2P) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS CASH_DISC_PCT_2,
  TRIM(EKKO.KUFIX) AS IN_FOR_FX_EXCH_RT,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.BWBDT = '00000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(EKKO.BWBDT, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS APPL_CLS_DTTM,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.ANGDT = '00000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(EKKO.ANGDT, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS DEADLN_FOR_SBMN_QUTN_DTTM,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.BNDDT = '00000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(EKKO.BNDDT, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS BIND_PER_FOR_QUTN_DTTM,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.GWLDT = '00000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(EKKO.GWLDT, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS WTY_DTTM,
  TRIM(EKKO.AUSNR) AS BID_INVT_NUM,
  TRIM(EKKO.ANGNR) AS QUTN_NUM,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.IHRAN = '00000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(EKKO.IHRAN, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS QUTN_SBMN_DTTM,
  TRIM(EKKO.IHREZ) AS YOUR_REF,
  TRIM(EKKO.VERKF) AS RESP_SLSPRSN_AT_SUP_OFF,
  TRIM(EKKO.TELF1) AS SUP_PHN_NUM,
  TRIM(EKKO.KUNNR) AS CUST_NUM,
  TRIM(EKKO.ACTIVE_ID) AS ACT_PRCHSNG_DOC,
  TRIM(EKKO.KONNR) AS NUM_OF_PRIN_PRCH_AGMT,
  TRIM(EKKO.ABGRU) AS FLD_NOT_USED1,
  TRIM(EKKO.AUTLF) AS CMPLT_DELV_STIP_FOR_EA_PO,
  TRIM(EKKO.WEAKT) AS GOODS_RCPT_MSG_IN,
  TRIM(EKKO.LBLIF) AS FLD_NOT_USED2,
  TRIM(EKKO.INCO1) AS INCOTERM1_CD,
  TRIM(EKKO.INCO2) AS INCOTERM2_CD,
  CAST(TRIM(EKKO.KTWRT) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS TRGT_VAL_HDR_AREA_PER_DSTN,
  TRIM(EKKO.DISTRIBUTIONTYPE) AS DSTN_TYPE_FOR_PRCHSNG_DOC,
  TRIM(EKKO.SUBMI) AS CLCTV_NUM,
  TRIM(EKKO.KNUMV) AS NUM_OF_THE_DOC_COND,
  TRIM(EKKO.KALSM) AS PCDR,
  TRIM(EKKO.STAFO) AS UPDT_GRP_FOR_STATS_UPDT,
  TRIM(EKKO.LIFRE) AS DIFF_INVC_PRTY,
  TRIM(EKKO.EXNUM) AS NUM_OF_FRGN_TRD_DATA,
  TRIM(EKKO.LOGSY) AS LOGL_SYS1,
  TRIM(EKKO.UPINC) AS ITM_NUM_INTV_FOR_SUBITM,
  TRIM(EKKO.STAKO) AS DOC_WTH_TIME_DEPN_COND,
  TRIM(EKKO.FRGGR) AS RLSE_GRP,
  TRIM(EKKO.FRGSX) AS RLSE_STRTGY,
  TRIM(EKKO.FRGKE) AS PRCHSNG_DOC_RLSE_IN,
  TRIM(EKKO.FRGZU) AS RLSE_ST,
  TRIM(EKKO.LANDS) AS CTRY_FOR_TAX_RPT,
  TRIM(EKKO.ADRNR) AS ADDR_NUM,
  TRIM(EKKO.STCEG_L) AS CTRY_OF_SLS_TAX_ID_NUM,
  TRIM(EKKO.STCEG) AS VAT_REGS_NUM,
  TRIM(EKKO.ABSGR) AS RSN_FOR_CNCL,
  TRIM(EKKO.ADDNR) AS DOC_NUM_FOR_ADDL,
  TRIM(EKKO.KORNR) AS CORR_OF_MISC_PRVSN,
  TRIM(EKKO.PROCSTAT) AS PRCHSNG_DOC_PRCSG_ST,
  TRIM(EKKO.PROCESS_INDICATOR) AS PRCS_IN_FOR_PRCH_ORDR,
  CAST(TRIM(EKKO.RLWRT) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS TOT_VAL_AT_TIME_OF_RLSE,
  TRIM(EKKO.CR_STAT) AS CHG_RQST_STS,
  TRIM(EKKO.SCMPROC) AS SCM_PRCS_CRT_THE_PO,
  TRIM(EKKO.REASON_CODE) AS GOODS_RCPT_RSN_CD,
  TRIM(EKKO.MEMORYTYPE) AS CAT_OF_ICMPT,
  TRIM(EKKO.RETTP) AS RETN_IN,
  CAST(TRIM(EKKO.RETPC) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS RETN_IN_PCT,
  TRIM(EKKO.DPTYP) AS DOWN_PMT_IN,
  CAST(TRIM(EKKO.DPPCT) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS DOWN_PMT_PCT,
  CAST(TRIM(EKKO.DPAMT) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS DOWN_PMT_AMT_IN_DOC_CRNCY,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.DPDAT = '00000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(EKKO.DPDAT, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS DOWN_PMT_DUE_DTTM,
  TRIM(EKKO.MSR_ID) AS PRCS_ID_NUM,
  TRIM(EKKO.HIERARCHY_EXISTS) AS PART_OF_A_CNTRC_HIER,
  TRIM(EKKO.GROUPING_ID) AS GRP_ID_FOR_CO_CD,
  TRIM(EKKO.PARENT_ID) AS ID_OF_THE_PARNT_DOC,
  TRIM(EKKO.THRESHOLD_EXISTS) AS THRSH_VAL_FOR_EXCH_RT_EXIST,
  TRIM(EKKO.LEGAL_CONTRACT) AS LEGAL_CNTRC_NUM,
  TRIM(EKKO.DESCRIPTION) AS CNTRC_NM,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.RELEASE_DATE = '00000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(EKKO.RELEASE_DATE, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS CNTRC_RLSE_DTTM,
  TRIM(EKKO.VSART) AS SHIPPING_TYPE,
  TRIM(EKKO.HANDOVERLOC) AS LOC_PHY_HANDOVR_OF_GOODS,
  TRIM(EKKO.SHIPCOND) AS SHIPPING_COND,
  TRIM(EKKO.INCOV) AS INCOTERMS_VERS,
  TRIM(EKKO.INCO2_L) AS INCOTERMS_LOC_1,
  TRIM(EKKO.INCO3_L) AS INCOTERMS_LOC_2,
  TRIM(EKKO.INCO2_KEY) AS INCO_LOC_1_PLACE_OF_DEST,
  TRIM(EKKO.INCO3_KEY) AS INCO_LOC_2_PLACE_OF_DELV,
  TRIM(EKKO.INCO4_KEY) AS INCO_DEVT_PLACE_OF_DEST,
  TRIM(EKKO.GRWCU) AS CRNCY_STAT_VAL_FOR_FRGN_TRD,
  TRIM(EKKO.INTRA_REL) AS RLVNT_FOR_INTSTAT_RPTG,
  TRIM(EKKO.INTRA_EXCL) AS EXCLD_FROM_INTSTAT_RPTG,
  TRIM(EKKO.TOTAL_STATUS_PCS) AS PROD_CMPLI_SUP_CHK_STS,
  TRIM(EKKO.TOTAL_STATUS_PMA) AS PROD_MRKT_STS,
  TRIM(EKKO.TOTAL_STATUS_DG) AS DNGRS_GOODS_STS,
  TRIM(EKKO.TOTAL_STATUS_SDS) AS SFTY_DATA_SHT_STS,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.QTN_ERLST_SUBMSN_DATE = '00000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(EKKO.QTN_ERLST_SUBMSN_DATE, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS QUTN_CAN_BE_SBMTD_DTTM,
  TRIM(EKKO.FOLLOWON_DOC_CAT) AS PRCHSNG_DOC_CAT,
  TRIM(EKKO.FOLLOWON_DOC_TYPE) AS PRCHSNG_DOC_TYPE,
  TRIM(EKKO.DUMMY_EKKO_INCL_EEW_PS) AS DATA_ELMNT_OF_PRCHNG_DOC_HDR,
  TRIM(EKKO.EXTERNALSYSTEM) AS ID_OF_EXTRNL_REF_SYS,
  TRIM(EKKO.EXTERNALREFERENCEID) AS EXTRNL_REF_ID,
  CAST(TRIM(EKKO.EXT_REV_TMSTMP) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS TMST_FOR_RVSN_OF_EXTRNL_CAL,
  TRIM(EKKO.ISEOPBLOCKED) AS BUSN_PRPS_CMPLT,
  TRIM(EKKO.ISAGED) AS DOC_IS_AGED,
  TRIM(EKKO.FORCE_ID) AS INTRNL_KEY_FOR_FRC_ELMNT,
  TRIM(EKKO.FORCE_CNT) AS INTRNL_CNTR,
  TRIM(EKKO.RELOC_ID) AS RELOC_ID,
  TRIM(EKKO.RELOC_SEQ_ID) AS RELOC_STEP_ID,
  TRIM(EKKO.SOURCE_LOGSYS) AS LOGL_SYS,
  TRIM(EKKO.FSH_TRANSACTION) AS TRX_NUM,
  TRIM(EKKO.FSH_ITEM_GROUP) AS ITM_GRP,
  TRIM(EKKO.FSH_VAS_LAST_ITEM) AS LAST_VAS_ITM_NUM,
  TRIM(EKKO.FSH_OS_STG_CHANGE) AS ORDR_SCHDLNG_STRTGY,
  TRIM(EKKO.TMS_REF_UUID) AS REF_UUID_OF_TRSPN_MGMT,
  TRIM(EKKO.ZAPCGK) AS ANNXNG_PKG_KEY,
  TRIM(EKKO.APCGK_EXTEND) AS EXTD_KEY_FOR_ANNXNG_PKG,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.ZBAS_DATE = '00000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(EKKO.ZBAS_DATE, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS BASE_DTTM,
  TRIM(EKKO.zadattyp) AS ANNXNG_DT_TYPE1,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.ZSTART_DAT = '00000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(EKKO.ZSTART_DAT, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS ANNXNG_STRT_DTTM,
  CAST(TRIM(EKKO.Z_DEV) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS DEVT_PCT,
  TRIM(EKKO.ZINDANX) AS ANNXD_ORDR_TYPE_IN,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.ZLIMIT_DAT = '00000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(EKKO.ZLIMIT_DAT, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS ANNXD_LMT_DTTM,
  TRIM(EKKO.NUMERATOR) AS IL_ANNXNG_NUMRTR,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.HASHCAL_BDAT = '00000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(EKKO.HASHCAL_BDAT, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS GENL_ACCNT_METH_DTTM,
  TRIM(EKKO.HASHCAL) AS ACCNT_GENL_METH,
  TRIM(EKKO.NEGATIVE) AS DO_NOT_ALLW_NGTV_ANNXNG,
  TRIM(EKKO.HASHCAL_EXISTS) AS PRCHSNG_ORG,
  TRIM(EKKO.KNOWN_INDEX) AS KNW_INDX_IN_IN,
  TRIM(EKKO.POSTAT) AS FL_FOR_S1POSTAT_MSG,
  TRIM(EKKO.VZSKZ) AS INT_IN,
  TRIM(EKKO.FSH_SNST_STATUS) AS SNAP_STS,
  TRIM(EKKO.PROCE) AS PCDR_NUM,
  TRIM(EKKO.CONC) AS ADJUSTMENT,
  TRIM(EKKO.CONT) AS CNTRC,
  TRIM(EKKO.COMP) AS LEGAL_CMPTC,
  TRIM(EKKO.OUTR) AS MISC,
  TRIM(EKKO.DESP) AS DESPATCH,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.DESP_DAT = '00000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(EKKO.DESP_DAT, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS DTTM1,
  TRIM(EKKO.DESP_CARGO) AS JOB1,
  TRIM(EKKO.PARE) AS ASES,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.PARE_DAT = '00000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(EKKO.PARE_DAT, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS DTTM2,
  TRIM(EKKO.PARE_CARGO) AS JOB2,
  TRIM(EKKO.PFM_CONTRACT) AS PTFM_CNTRC_IN_PRCHSNG_PRCS,
  TRIM(EKKO.POHF_TYPE) AS DOC_FOR_SEAS_PO_PRCSG,
  CASE
    WHEN EKKO.EQ_EINDT = '00000000' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(EKKO.EQ_EINDT, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS DELV_HDR_DTTM,
  TRIM(EKKO.EQ_WERKS) AS PLNT_HDR,
  TRIM(EKKO.FIXPO) AS FIRM_DEAL_IN,
  TRIM(EKKO.EKGRP_ALLOW) AS TAKE_ACCT_OF_PRCH_GRP,
  TRIM(EKKO.WERKS_ALLOW) AS TAKE_ACCT_OF_PLNT,
  TRIM(EKKO.CONTRACT_ALLOW) AS TAKE_ACCT_OF_CNTRC,
  TRIM(EKKO.PSTYP_ALLOW) AS TAKE_ACCT_OF_ITM_CTGY,
  TRIM(EKKO.FIXPO_ALLOW) AS TAKE_ACCT_OF_FX_DT_PRCH_IN,
  TRIM(EKKO.KEY_ID_ALLOW) AS CNSDR_BGT,
  TRIM(EKKO.AUREL_ALLOW) AS TAKE_ACCT_OF_ALLC_TBL_RLVNC,
  TRIM(EKKO.DELPER_ALLOW) AS TAKE_ACCT_OF_DLVY_PER,
  TRIM(EKKO.EINDT_ALLOW) AS TAKE_ACCT_OF_DELV_DT,
  TRIM(EKKO.LTSNR_ALLOW) AS INCL_VEND_SUBRNGE,
  TRIM(EKKO.OTB_LEVEL) AS OTB_CHK_LVL,
  TRIM(EKKO.OTB_COND_TYPE) AS OTB_COND_TYPE,
  TRIM(EKKO.KEY_ID) AS UNIQ_NUM_OF_BGT,
  CAST(TRIM(EKKO.OTB_VALUE) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS REQ_BGT,
  TRIM(EKKO.OTB_CURR) AS OTB_CRNCY
FROM
  {Config.sourceDatabase}.EKKO EKKO
  LEFT JOIN {Config.sourceDatabase}.T024E T024E ON EKKO.EKORG = T024E.EKORG
  AND T024E._deleted_ = 'F'
  AND T024E.MANDT = (
    SELECT
      L1_PARAMETERS.PARAM_VAL
    FROM
      CONFIG.L1_PARAMETERS L1_PARAMETERS
    WHERE
      L1_PARAMETERS.ENV_NM = '{env}'
      AND L1_PARAMETERS.PARAM_NM = 'mandt_filter'
  )
WHERE
  EKKO._deleted_ = 'F'
  AND EKKO.MANDT = (
    SELECT
      L1_PARAMETERS.PARAM_VAL
    FROM
      CONFIG.L1_PARAMETERS L1_PARAMETERS
    WHERE
      L1_PARAMETERS.ENV_NM = '{env}'
      AND L1_PARAMETERS.PARAM_NM = 'mandt_filter'
  )  
 
""")
